name: sonky da bad
description:
stori: u play games and then ur friend kyl give u a letter with a damn CD. da letter says:  "Tomi, i dont want it NO NO NO. he meme me and he meme u if u dont destory cd. pls do, or he will turn u into a meme. PLLSSSSSS DESTROY DA DISC NOWWWWWWWWW >:(      -Kyl". Despit ignorin his frend he plays game and what happens we dont know play the game urself and find out.

Notes:

Sonky Da Bad is an inspiration (and copy/parody) of Sunky The Evil. Sunky is rightfully owned by LooneyDude. Sonic The Hedgehog owned by SEGA, and Sonic.EXE owned by JC the Hyena.

Fluffing a Duck by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
